docs.title: Documentation
docs.subtitle: Step-by-step instructions for installation, configuration and usage

step1.title: Download the installer
step1.description: Go to the downloads page and download the Windows version. The file will have .exe extension

step2.title: Run the installer
step2.description: Double-click the downloaded file. If a security warning appears, click 'Allow' or 'Run'

step3.title: Follow the installation wizard
step3.description: Choose installation folder (default is Program Files), accept the license terms and click 'Install'

step4.title: Wait for installation to complete
step4.description: The installation process will take a few minutes. Do not close the installer window until completion

step5.title: Launch the program
step5.description: After installation, the program will be available in the Start menu. You can also launch it from the desktop if a shortcut was created

step1.title: Download the APK file
step1.description: Go to the downloads page and download the Android version. The file will have .apk extension

step2.title: Allow installation from unknown sources
step2.description: In Android settings, go to 'Security' and enable 'Install from unknown sources' for your browser

step3.title: Install the application
step3.description: Open the downloaded APK file and tap 'Install'. Wait for installation to complete

step4.title: Launch the application
step4.description: After installation, find the app icon on the home screen or in the app drawer and launch it

step1.title: Prepare the server
step1.description: Make sure Windows Server or Windows 10/11 is installed. Requires at least 4GB RAM and 10GB free space

step2.title: Download the server version
step2.description: Download the server version from the main downloads page

step3.title: Install the program
step3.description: Run the installer as administrator. Choose installation folder and follow the instructions

step4.title: Configure network access
step4.description: Configure firewall and network settings for cash register access to the server. Default port: 8080

step1.title: Enter license key
step1.description: On first launch, the program will request a license key. Enter the key you received after registration and payment

step2.title: Create administrator
step2.description: Create an administrator account with username and password. This account will have full access to settings

step3.title: Select business type
step3.description: Specify your business type: store or pharmacy. This will determine available features and modules

step1.title: Fill in shop information
step1.description: In 'Settings' → 'Shop' section, enter name, tax ID, address and other information about your shop

step2.title: Configure currency and taxes
step2.description: Select working currency (som, dollar, etc.) and configure tax rates if necessary

step3.title: Configure receipt printing
step3.description: Connect receipt printer and configure print format. You can use either physical printer or virtual one for PDF saving

step1.title: Add cash register
step1.description: In 'Settings' → 'Cash Registers' section, click 'Add Cash Register'. Enter name and select register type

step2.title: Connect equipment
step2.description: Connect barcode scanner, scales (if needed) and other equipment. The program will automatically detect connected devices

step3.title: Configure access rights
step3.description: For each cash register, configure user access rights. You can restrict access to certain functions

step1.title: Open sales section
step1.description: In the main menu, select 'Sales' or click the corresponding button on the home screen

step2.title: Add items to receipt
step2.description: Use barcode scanner or search by name to add items. You can manually specify quantity

step3.title: Apply discounts
step3.description: If necessary, apply discounts to items or entire receipt. You can use percentage or fixed discounts

step4.title: Complete the sale
step4.description: Select payment method (cash, card, transfer) and complete the sale. Receipt will be automatically printed and saved

step1.title: Add items
step1.description: In 'Warehouse' → 'Items' section, add new items. Specify name, SKU, price, stock and other information

step2.title: Conduct inventory
step2.description: Use 'Inventory' function to reconcile actual stock with system data

step3.title: Process deliveries and write-offs
step3.description: In 'Warehouse' section, process item receipts from suppliers or write-offs when necessary

step1.title: Open reports section
step1.description: In the main menu, select 'Reports' to view various reports on sales, stock and profit

step2.title: Select report type
step2.description: Choose the needed report: sales for period, item stock, profit, popular items, etc.

step3.title: Configure parameters and export
step3.description: Specify period and other report parameters. Report can be viewed on screen, printed or exported to Excel/PDF

q1.question: Program won't start
q1.answer: Make sure you have the latest .NET Framework installed. Restart your computer and try running the program as administrator

q2.question: Barcode scanner not working
q2.answer: Check scanner connection to computer. Make sure drivers are installed. In program settings, verify that scanner is selected as input device

q3.question: Receipts not printing
q3.answer: Check printer connection and paper availability. In program settings, make sure correct printer is selected. Try printing a test page
